r.s: Central Authentication Service client library in php
r.d: This package is a PEAR installable library for using a Central Authentication Service.
r.n:
Bug Fix: * fixed PGT storage path on Windows (Olivier Thebault).
New Features: * added methods setCasServerCert() and setCasServerCaCert() to authenticate the CAS server, and method setNoCasServerValidation() to skip the SSL checks (Pascal Aubry, requested by Andrew Petro). * Added spanish and catalan translations (Ivan Garcia).
